p: Most interviewers initiated the consumption of medicinal plants for prevention and treatment following the recommendations of friends and family ( n = 226, 46.4%), being less who started by their own initiative ( n = 216, 44.3%) (Table 8). The information concerning the therapeutically uses of medicinal plants came mainly from family and friends ( n = 234, 48.1%), followed by pharmacist ( n = 210, 43.1%) and the internet ( n = 160, 32.8%) (Table 8).
